articles.content:
S. Korean authorities' unjust step 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The South Korean Ministry of Unification on October 10 did not allow 33 persons to participate in the meeting of youth and students from the north, the south and abroad for reunification, according to a news report.
 Among them are students and youth affiliated to the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils and the South Korean Council of Youth Organizations, Journalists and Delegates and members of public organizations.    
 The authorities took such step on charges that they are members of "enemy-benefiting organizations" or some others had violated the security law.

articles.title: DPRK girl Ham Pong Sil wins women's Marathon at Asiad
articles.content:
DPRK girl Ham Pong Sil wins women's Marathon at Asiad 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Girl Ham Pong Sil won the women's Marathon at the 14th Asian Games, clocking two hours 33 minutes and 34 seconds.
